00024 GLWindow::GLWindow(unsigned w, unsigned h, bool frameless)
00025 : QGLWidget((QWidget *)0,0,static_cast<Qt::WindowFlags>(Qt::MSWindowsOwnDC|(frameless ? Qt::FramelessWindowHint : 0))), running(0), paused(false), tooFastWarned(false),  lastHWFC(0), tLastFrame(0.), tLastLastFrame(0.)
00026 {
00027     QSize s(w, h);
00028     setMaximumSize(s);
00029     setMinimumSize(s);
00030     resize(w, h); // static size for now    
00031     setAutoBufferSwap(false);
00032     QGLFormat f = format();
00033     f.setDoubleBuffer(true);
00034 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x040200
00035     f.setSwapInterval(1); 
00036 #else
00037 #   error Need Qt 4.2 or above to enable GL swapinterval!
00038 #endif
00039 
00040     setFormat(f);
00041     setMouseTracking(false);
00042     timer = new QTimer(this);
00043     Connect(timer, SIGNAL(timeout()), this, SLOT(updateGL()));
00044     timer->setSingleShot(true);
00045     timer->start(0);
00046     setWindowTitle(WINDOW_TITLE);
00047 }
00048 
00049 GLWindow::~GLWindow() { 
00050     if (running) running->stop(); 
00051     // be sure to remove all plugins while we are still a valid GLWindow instance, to avoid a crash bug
00052     while (pluginsList.count())
00053         delete pluginsList.front(); // StimPlugin * should auto-remove itself from list so list will shrink..
00054 }

00056 void GLWindow::closeEvent(QCloseEvent *evt)
00057 {
00058     if (stimApp()->console()->isHidden()) {
00059         // let's accept the close event and close the app
00060         evt->accept();
00061         qApp->quit();
00062     } else
00063         // the console is open so closing this window should not be allowed
00064         evt->ignore();
00065 }
00066 
00067 void GLWindow::resizeEvent(QResizeEvent *evt)
00068 {
00069     if (evt->size().width() <= maximumSize().width()
00070         && evt->size().height() <= maximumSize().height()
00071         && evt->size().width() >= minimumSize().width()
00072         && evt->size().height() >= minimumSize().height()) 
00073             evt->accept();
00074     else 
00075             evt->ignore();
00076 }

00078 // Set up the rendering context, define display lists etc.:
00079 void GLWindow::initializeGL()
00080 {
00081     Debug() << "initializeGL()";
00082     // to make the system fast, make sure that a lot of stuff that OpenGL is capable of is disabled
00083     glDisable( GL_DEPTH_TEST );
00084     glDisable( GL_ALPHA_TEST );
00085     glDisable( GL_SCISSOR_TEST );
00086     glDisable( GL_LIGHT0 );
00087     glDisable( GL_STENCIL_TEST );
00088     glDisable( GL_DITHER );
00089     glDrawBuffer( GL_BACK_LEFT );
00090 
00091     glClearColor( 0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 1.0 ); //set the clearing color to be gray
00092     glShadeModel( GL_FLAT );
00093     glPixelStorei( GL_UNPACK_ALIGNMENT, 1 );
00094 }
00095 
00096 // setup viewport, projection etc.:
00097 void GLWindow::resizeGL(int w, int h)
00098 {
00099     Debug() << "resizeGL(" << w << ", " << h << ")";
00100 
00101     // set the viewport to be the entire window
00102     glViewport(0, 0,(GLsizei)w, (GLsizei)h );
00103     glMatrixMode( GL_PROJECTION );
00104     glLoadIdentity();
00105     gluOrtho2D( 0.0, (GLdouble)w, 0.0, (GLdouble) h );
00106 
00107 }
00108 
00109 // draw each frame
00110 void GLWindow::paintGL()
00111 {
00112     tThisFrame = getTime();
00113     bool tooFast = false, tooSlow = false;
00114 
00115     if (timer->isActive()) return; // this was a spurious paint event
00116            //    unsigned timerpd = 1000/getHWRefreshRate()/2;
00117     unsigned timerpd = 1000/stimApp()->refreshRate()/2;
00118     if (stimApp()->busy()) timerpd = 0;
00119 
00120 #ifdef Q_OS_WIN
00121     if (getNProcessors() < 2 && tThisFrame - tLastFrame <= timerpd*1e3) {
00122         // we got called again quickly, yield CPU to prevent locking machine
00123         SwitchToThread();
00124         tThisFrame = getTime();
00125     }
00126 #endif
00127 
00128     if (hasAccurateHWFrameCount()) {
00129         unsigned hwfc = getHWFrameCount();
00130 
00131         if (lastHWFC && hwfc==lastHWFC) {
00132             tooFast = true;
00133         } else if (lastHWFC && hwfc-lastHWFC > 1) {
00134             tooSlow = true;
00135         }
00136         lastHWFC = hwfc;
00137     } else if (!stimApp()->busy()/*hasAccurateHWRefreshRate()*/ && tLastLastFrame > 0.) {
00138         double diff = tThisFrame-tLastFrame/*, diff2 = tThisFrame-tLastLastFrame*/;
00139         double tFrames = 1.0/getHWRefreshRate();
00140         if (diff > tFrames*2.) tooSlow = true;
00141         /*else if (diff2 < tFrames) tooFast = true;*/
00142     }
00143 
00144     if (tooFast) {
00145         if (!tooFastWarned) {
00146             //Debug() << "Frame " << getHWFrameCount() << " too fast, will render later";
00147             tooFastWarned = true;
00148         }
00149         timer->start(timerpd);
00150         return;
00151     }
00152     tooFastWarned = false;
00153 
00154     if (tooSlow) {
00155         Warning() << "Dropped frame " << getHWFrameCount();
00156     }
00157                
00158     if (!paused) {
00159         // NB: don't clear here, let the plugin do clearing as an optimization
00160         // glClear( GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT );
00161 
00162         if (running) {
00163             if (tooSlow) 
00164                 // indicate the frame was skipped
00165                 running->putMissedFrame(static_cast<unsigned>((tThisFrame-tLastFrame)*1e3));
00166             running->cycleTimeLeft = 1.0/getHWRefreshRate();
00167             running->computeFPS();            
00168             running->drawFrame();
00169             // NB: running ptr may be made null if drawFrame() called stop()
00170             if (running) ++running->frameNum;
00171         }
00172     }
00173 
00174     tLastLastFrame = tLastFrame;
00175     tLastFrame = tThisFrame;
00176 
00177     swapBuffers();// should wait for vsync...   
00178 
00179 #ifdef Q_OS_WIN
00180     //timer->start(timerpd);     
00181     update();
00182 #else
00183     timer->start(0);     
00184 #endif
00185 
00186     if (running && !paused) {
00187         running->cycleTimeLeft -= getTime()-tThisFrame;
00188         running->afterVSync();
00189     }
00190     
00191 }

00193 void GLWindow::pluginCreated(StimPlugin *p)
00194 {
00195     if (pluginsList.indexOf(p) < 0) {
00196         pluginsList.push_back(p);
00197     }
00198 }
00199 
00200 void GLWindow::pluginDeleted(StimPlugin *p)
00201 {
00202     pluginsList.removeAll(p);
00203     if (running == p) { running = 0; }
00204 }
00205 
00206 void GLWindow::pluginStarted(StimPlugin *p)
00207 {
00208     if (running) { running->stop(); }
00209     running = p;
00210     Log() << p->name() << " started";
00211 
00212 }
00213 
00214 void GLWindow::pluginStopped(StimPlugin *p)
00215 {
00216     if (running == p) {
00217         running = 0;
00218         paused = false;
00219         Log() << p->name() << " stopped.";
00220         setWindowTitle(WINDOW_TITLE);
00221     } else {
00222         Error() << "pluginStopped() but running != p";
00223     }
00224 }

00226 
00227 StimPlugin *GLWindow::pluginFind(const QString &name, bool casesensitive)
00228 {
00229     Qt::CaseSensitivity cs = casesensitive ? Qt::CaseSensitive : Qt::CaseInsensitive;
00230     for(QList<StimPlugin *>::iterator it = pluginsList.begin(); it != pluginsList.end(); ++it) {
00231         if ((*it)->name().compare(name, cs) == 0) {
00232             return *it;
00233         }
00234     }
00235     return 0; // not found!
00236 }

00239 //--- put new StimPlugins here, and then modify GLWindow::initPlugins()
00240 #include "CalibPlugin.h"
00241 #include "MovingObjects.h"
00242 #include "MovingGrating.h"
00243 #include "CheckerFlicker.h"
00244 void GLWindow::initPlugins()
00245 {
00246     Log() << "Initializing plugins...";
00247 
00248     // it's ok to new these objects -- they automatically attach themselves 
00249     // to this instance and will be auto-deleted when this object is deleted.
00250 #ifndef Q_OS_WIN
00251     new CalibPlugin(); 
00252 #endif
00253     new MovingObjects();  // experiment plugin.. bouncey square!
00254     new MovingGrating();  // experiment plugin.. the grid!
00255     new CheckerFlicker(); // experiment plugin.. the checkerboard!
00256 
00257     // TODO: more plugins here
00258 
00259 
00260     Log() << "Initialized " << pluginsList.size() << " plugins.";
00261 }

00263 // overrides QWidget methoed -- catch keypresses
00264 void GLWindow::keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent *event)
00265 {
00266     makeCurrent(); // just in case they do opengl commands in their plugin
00267     if (running && running->processKey(event->key())) {
00268         event->accept();
00269         Debug() << "Key '" << char(event->key()) << "' accepted.";
00270         return;
00271     }
00272     switch (event->key()) {
00273     case ' ': // space bar, pause/unpause
00274         stimApp()->pauseUnpause();
00275         break;
00276     case 'L':
00277     case 'l':
00278         //stimApp()->loadStim();
00279         QTimer::singleShot(1, stimApp(), SLOT(loadStim())); // ends up possibly deleting this object, so we don't want to run this from this event handler, thus we'll enqueue it.
00280         break;
00281     case 'd':
00282     case 'D':
00283         stimApp()->setDebugMode(!stimApp()->isDebugMode());
00284         break;
00285 #ifndef Q_OS_WIN
00286     case 'r':
00287     case 'R':
00288         stimApp()->calibrateRefresh();
00289         break;
00290 #endif
00291     case 'c':
00292     case 'C':
00293         stimApp()->hideUnhideConsole();
00294         break;
00295     case 'a':
00296     case 'A':
00297         //stimApp()->alignGLWindow();
00298         QTimer::singleShot(1, stimApp(), SLOT(alignGLWindow())); // ends up deleting this object, so we don't want to run this from this event handler, thus we'll enqueue it.
00299         break;
00300 
00301     case Qt::Key_Escape: 
00302         //stimApp()->unloadStim();
00303         QTimer::singleShot(1, stimApp(), SLOT(unloadStim())); // may end up possibly deleting this object?
00304 
00305         break;
00306     }
00307 }
00308 
00309 void GLWindow::pauseUnpause()
00310 {
00311     if (!running) return;
00312     paused = !paused;
00313     Log() << (paused ? "Paused" : "Unpaused");
00314     if (!paused && !running->frameNum && running->needNotifyStart) 
00315         running->notifySpikeGLAboutStart();    
00316 }

00318 QList<QString> GLWindow::plugins() const
00319 {
00320     QList<QString> ret;
00321     for(QList<StimPlugin *>::const_iterator it = pluginsList.begin(); it != pluginsList.end(); ++it) {
00322         ret.push_back((*it)->name());
00323     }
00324     return ret;
00325 }
